item.title: Transfer rumors, news: João Cancelo back on Barcelona's radar
item.description: Former Barcelona target João Cancelo is once again in the sights of the LaLiga champions. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Pats' Diggs faces strangulation, assault charges
item.description: Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is facing a felony charge of strangulation and a misdemeanor charge of assault from alleged Dec. 2 incident.

item.title: Cowboys release two-time Pro Bowl CB Diggs
item.description: The Cowboys have released cornerback Trevon Diggs. He will become a free agent if he goes unclaimed on waivers.

item.title: Seals, in first start for TCU, leads OT win vs. USC
item.description: Ken Seals passed for 258 yards and the winning touchdown to Jeremy Payne in overtime as TCU rallied to beat No. 16 USC 30-27 on Tuesday night in the A...

item.title: Edgecombe's last-second 3 propels Sixers in OT
item.description: Rookie VJ Edgecombe rewarded the Sixers' faith in him by connecting on a tiebreaking 25-foot jumper with 1.7 seconds left, lifting Philadelphia to a 1...
